education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

experience.title: Junior Software Developer
description: Developed a software library using Python, resulting in a 30% reduction in development time and a 20% increase in code reusability.
Developed software for embedded systems using Assembly language, resulting in a 100% success rate in meeting project deadlines and a 15% reduction in system errors.

projects.title: Responsive Portfolio Website
projects.description: Developed a visually appealing and responsive portfolio website to showcase my skills and experience. Implemented responsive design principles to ensure it adapts seamlessly across various devices (desktop, tablet, mobile).

projects.title: Interactive To- Do List App (HTML, CSS, Javascript)
projects.description: Built an interactive to-do list web application using JavaScript. Users can add, edit, and mark tasks as complete. Explored functionalities like local storage or browser cookies for persistence, allowing users to save their to-do lists.

projects.title: E commerce Website
projects.description: Constructed a simple e-commerce website demonstrating product listings, shopping cart features, and basic checkout functionalities. Utilized HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to structure web pages, handle user input, and integrate with a test payment gateway (consider mentioning the specific API used, if applicable).

projects.title: Single-Page Application (SPA) Landing Page (React/Vue.js)
projects.description: Created a dynamic single-page application landing page using a framework like React or Vue.js. Highlighted understanding of component-based architecture and dynamic content loading, showcasing the ability to build modern, interactive web experiences.
